channel.title: (pi)spawn rights(pi)
channel.description: ok so my friend is stuck he coded spawn rights into his server to where ppl cant pk when they have spawn rights well now he wants it to where "when player who got activated spawn rights kills another player that dosnt have spawn rights and both players dont lose any items when one of them die. for example: i have spawn rights i go over and kill them and they die but dont lose items like owners or admins in some servers and if they kill me i keep my stuff. but if 2 people without spawn rights kill each other they still get the drop. pls help hes very :confused: lol pls?
